storyNodes.text: You are in a dark room. You can't see anything.

choices.text: "Try to remember how you got here."

storyNodes.text: "You feel around the wall next to you and find a door handle."

choices.text: "Push the handle harder to see if it's locked."
"Ignore the door and continue down the hallway."

storyNodes.text: "The handle doesn't budge; it seems to be locked from the other side. You hear faint whispers coming from outside the door. You decide to listen closer in hopes of understanding what they are saying."

choices.text: "You hear them mentioning a secret code that unlocks the door."
"The whispers grow louder as you realize they're talking about you!"
"Suddenly, the voices fade away, leaving you in silence."
"Option A - Follow the path to the left"
"Option B - Search for clues in the room"
"Option C - Ask the mysterious figure for help"
